article_text:
Thank you for reading 5 free articles on our site. You can come back at the end of your 30-day period for another 5 free articles, or you can purchase a subscription at this time and continue to enjoy valuable local news and information. If you need help, please contact our office at 928-783-3333. You need an online service to view this article in its entirety.

og.description: There are currently 941 inmates convicted in Yuma County serving out their sentences at one of the various Arizona state prisons – a small portion of the total 41,528 prisoners currently incarcerated by the Arizona Department of Corrections (ADC).
og.title: Yuma County inmate population small

article_metadata.description: There are currently 941 inmates convicted in Yuma County serving out their sentences at one of the various Arizona state prisons – a small portion of the total 41,528 prisoners currently incarcerated by the Arizona Department of Corrections (ADC).
